slide.title: A self-portrait by artist Narayan Chandra Biswas, symbolising confusion and also his existence within the many aspects of nature - as SM Sultan would have appreciated. Photo: Andrew Eagle
Detail of the poster advertising the exhibition of Narayan Chandra Biswas and Ali Azgar Raja attended by SM Sultan at the time of the opening of Itna public library. Photo: Andrew Eagle
SM Sultan's boat outside the SM Sultan Memorial Gallery in Narail, and beside the Chitra River where he used it. Photo: Andrew Eagle
SM Sultan, Farmers in Confrontation, oil on canvas. Photo: Andrew Eagle
SM Sultan's equipment as displayed at the SM Sultan Memorial Gallery, Narail. Photo: Andrew Eagle
